mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (UserID, PostID, Content, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.Name as user_name, CASE WHEN c.related_type = 'CROP' THEN (SELECT CropName FROM Crop WHERE CropID = c.related_id) WHEN c.related_type = 'DIARY' THEN (SELECT title FROM FarmingDiary WHERE FarmingDiaryID = c.related_id) WHEN c.related_type = 'REVIEW' THEN (SELECT CONCAT('리뷰 #', ReviewID) FROM Review WHERE ReviewID = c.related_id) END as related_title FROM Comment c LEFT JOIN User u ON c.UserID = u.UserID WHERE c.CommentID = #{commentId}

SELECT c.*, u.name as user_name, CASE WHEN c.related_type = 'CROP' THEN (SELECT crop_name FROM crop WHERE crop_id = c.related_id) WHEN c.related_type = 'DIARY' THEN (SELECT title FROM farmingdiary WHERE diary_id = c.related_id) WHEN c.related_type = 'REVIEW' THEN (SELECT CONCAT('리뷰 #', review_id) FROM review WHERE review_id = c.related_id) END as related_title FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
